item.title: Service Interphone System Nose Gear Jack – Flight and Service Interphone Inoperative

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided alternate procedures are established and used.

numlitem.para: If both Flight and Service Interphone systems are inoperative, use standard hand signals. Coordination with ground personnel to ensure mutual understanding of hand signals is mandatory.

placard.para: Placard Crewmember Interphone System Flight Deck to Ground "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
